request.description:
Endpoint to edit user profile by UID. Characteristics: - Requires Session. - Return Boolean True if success. Variations: - Users with token account:profile and privilege update:admin can update and change all profiles excluding superadmins. - Users with token all and privilege superadmin can update and change all profiles. Errors 400 (Array): | **Code/Variable** | **Message** | | --- | --- | | VPU0001A
UIDUser | Must be a String | | VPU0001B
UIDUser | Must not exceed 36 characters | | VPU0001C
UIDUser | You can't edit this account | | VPU0001D
UIDUser | User do not exists | | VPU0001E
UIDUser | User is disabled | | VPU0002A
FullNameUser | Must be a String | | VPU0002B
FullNameUser | Must not exceed 100 characters | | VPU0003A
SecondaryEmailUser | Must be a valid email | | VPU0004A
MobileNumberUser | Must be a valid number phone | | VPU0005A
PhoneNumberUser | Must be a valid number phone | | VPU0006A
WhatsappUser | Must be a valid number phone | | VPU0007A
BiographyUser | Must be a String | | VPU0007B
BiographyUser | Must not exceed 255 characters | | VPU0008A
FullAddressUser | Must be a String | | VPU0008B
FullAddressUser | Must not exceed 255 characters | | VPU0009A
Locations | Locations must be an array | | VPU0009B
Locations | Locations not found | Errors 403 (Array): | **Code/Variable** | **Message** | | --- | --- | | PSV0001A | Required Token | | PSV0002A | Required Privilege | Errors 500 (JSON): | **Code** | **Message** | | --- | --- | | IEC0001A
ISE0001A
IVC0001A
ISV0001A
IAU0001B | An internal server error has occurred. Please try again later. |
